sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血紅素是血紅蛋白的輔基，有極其廣泛和重要的應用。

sentences.english: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.chinese: 血紅素或球蛋白的正常產生收到干擾會導致貧血。

sentences.english: After centrifugation, the purity of the crude product was 23%.
sentences.chinese: 離心分離後，血紅素粗品的純度爲23%。

sentences.english: Vitamin C greatly increases the absorption of non-haem iron.
sentences.chinese: 維生素C大大提高了吸收非血紅素鐵。

sentences.english: It was studied in a systematic way that heme was extracted from porcine blood corpuscle by glacial acetic acid.
sentences.chinese: 系統地研究了冰醋酸法提取豬血球中的血紅素。

sentences.english: Two methods of extracting haem from pig blood are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹從豬血中提取血紅素的兩種方法。

sentences.english: Objective A method has been developed for the determination of the dissolution of hemin capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氯高鐵血紅素溶出度測定方法。

sentences.english: This structure is called the heme group .
sentences.chinese: 這一結構叫做血紅素基因。

sentences.english: Does Genetic Ancestry Explain Higher Values of Glycated Hemoglobin in African Americans?
sentences.chinese: 遺傳先祖能否解釋非洲裔美國人糖化血紅素的值較高？

sentences.english: Heme can form stable monolayer on pure water (subphase).
sentences.chinese: 發現血紅素能夠形成穩定的單分子膜。

sentences.english: On the contrary, excessive expression of HO will result in injury of its target organs.
sentences.chinese: 相反血紅素加氧酶過度表達則可能導致靶器官的損傷。

sentences.english: At the cessation of NF3exposure, methemoglobin reverts back to hemoglobin.
sentences.chinese: 在NF3暴露停止後，高鐵血紅蛋白轉化回血紅素。

sentences.english: The non-heme iron has not been linked with cancer.
sentences.chinese: 非亞鐵血紅素和癌症之間沒有聯繫。

sentences.english: This article aims to summarize exercise and the skeletal muscle heme oxygenase system.
sentences.chinese: 此研究擬對運動與骨骼肌血紅素加氧酶系統作以綜述。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
